name: Creature (vatik)
description:
WIP while learning GameStudio, bit of fun for the Yogscast Game Jam.

Theme: Giving

Concept was a pac-man style game where you need to navigate a maze to collect presents, in order to deliver them later.

First time in ages doing any coding, and first time using GameStudio 2! Learning curve was a bit steep, but had a blast.

Thanks to Ian for the quick work on the sound assets. :-)
